mapper.select: SELECT pdi_target_host FROM public_deploy_info WHERE pdi_seq = #{seq} LIMIT 1

SELECT trh_app_ip as trhAppIp, trh_redis_ip as trhRedisIp, trh_redis_flag as trhRedisFlag, trh_slave_ip as trhSlaveIp, trh_cluster_type as trhClusterType, trh_rdb_open as trhRdbOpen, trh_rdb_file as trhRdbFile, trh_rdb_save_type as trhRdbSaveType, trh_aof_open as trhAofOpen, trh_aof_file as trhAofFile, trh_aof_save_type as trhAofSaveType, trh_aof_rdb_open as trhAofRdbOpen, trh_memory_count as trhMemoryCount, trh_memory_available_count as trhMemoryAvailableCount, trh_memory_peak as trhMemoryPeak, trh_memory_fragmentation_ratio as trhMemoryFragmentationCount, trh_keyspace_ratio as trhKeyspaceRatio, trh_keys_count as trhKeysCount, trh_last_rdb_status as trhLastRdbStatus, trh_last_aof_status as trhLastAofStatus, trh_last_fork_usec as trhLastForkUsec, trh_conn_total_count as trhConnTotalCount, trh_conn_cur_count as trhConnCurCount, trh_conn_block_count as trhConnBlockCount, trh_log_path as trhLogPath, trh_config_path as trhConfigPath, trh_sentinel_monitor as trhSentinelMonitor, trh_sentinel_config_path as trhSentinelConfigPath, gmt_modify as gmtModify FROM trace_redis_health WHERE trh_app_ip = #{appIp}

SELECT tsi_service_bean_name as tsiServiceBeanName, tsi_service_name as tsiServiceName, tsi_service_path as tsiServicePath, tsi_provider as tsiProvider, tsi_consumer as tsiConsumer, tsi_provider_names as tsiProviderNames, tsi_consumer_names as tsiConsumerNames, gmt_modify as gmtModify, #{appIp} as appIp FROM trace_services_info
tsi_provider_names like CONCAT('%', #{appIp}, '%')
and tsi_service_bean_name = #{serviceBeanName} limit 1
